    "comment": [
        "The subsequence of primes begins: 20479, 1310719, 1407374883553279, 90071992547409919, 23611832414348226068479, .. generated by exponents n= 4, 6, 16, 18, 24, 90,.... [Jonathan Vos Post, Oct 31 2011]"

    ],
    "formula": [
        "a(n) = 8*a(n-1)+7. a(n) = 9*a(n-1)-8*a(n-2), n>1.",
        "G.f. ( 4+3*x ) / ( (8*x-1)*(x-1) ). - R. J. Mathar, Oct 31 2011"

        "(MAGMA) [5*8^n-1: n in [0..30]]"
